entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
